name: SUMMIT
description: Climbing to the $SUMMIT on $AVAX — $SUMMIT is the next-generation memecoin blazing a trail on Avalanche. Born from peak‑chasing energy, $SUMMIT channels the thrill of reaching the top. Each milestone, tweet, and community push elevates the movement closer to its lofty summit. With high‑octane momentum—token surges, hype, and chart climbs, $SUMMIT isn’t just another meme; it’s an ascent. Its vibrant on‑chain activity, backed by a passionate Avalanche community, fuels every leg of the climb. Whether you’re hodling through bear valleys or riding bull‑run slopes, $SUMMIT is your Sherpa, guiding you straight to the peak. Strap in, HODL tight, and let’s summit together!
